content: Jonathan Whiteley | Department of Computer Science Skip to main content University of Oxford Department of Computer Science HomeAbout UsPeopleJonathan WhiteleyJonathan Whiteley Professor Jonathan Whiteley Deputy Director of Graduate StudiesAssociate Professor of Computer ScienceGoverning Body Fellow, Linacre CollegeE: Jonathan.Whiteley@cs.ox.ac.ukT: +44 1865 273858 Room 365, Wolfson Building, Parks Road, Oxford OX1 3QD United Kingdom Themes:Computational Biology and Health InformaticsCompleted Projects:more…InterestsMy research focuses on mathematical modelling and scientific computing related to multiscale, multiphysics problems arising in physiology and biology.BiographyI received the BA, MA and DPhil degrees from the University of Oxford. After holding various temporary posts at the University of Oxford and the University of Sydney I was appointed to a University Lectureship.Selected PublicationsView AllManage publications Sensitivity of cartilage mechanical behaviour to spatial variations in material properties J.P.
